dublin_core.dcvalue: Since 1999 the University Hospital Zurich Zurich Switzerland has offered an e mail based consultation service for individual health concerns where anonymous questions can be asked to an online doctor This study aimed at the characterization of the user profile the content of the question and the answers given specific in the field of psychiatry
Telemedicine journal and e-health : the official journal of the American Telemedicine Association
Psychological online consultation service attracts men: a new approach to close the gap between being ill and being treated.
